phrases: It was difficult to write calligraphy on a boat,
so it was a good experience.
Once I thought of it as soiling white paper,
that made it easy to do.
Thanks to that, my brush feels less heavy now.
There is one month until the Naruka Institute Calligraphy Exhibition.
With a month, this time I should be...
I will come bringin' more when you run out.
He really does come and go through the back way.
There is no way I can eat all this pickled daikon myself.
However, I need to focus on calligraphy now.
I will use a more novel calligraphy style,
The Konomon Institute Calligraphy Exhibition is next month
Translation: Going Swimming at the Beach
I will come bringin' more when you run out.
That is awful rude of you.
Grampa said ya can never have too much, an' told me to bring this.
Sensei, help us with our assignment.
First, hold the brush in your right hand.
It is not impossible, but inkstone placement and such make it harder.
Okay, I will write the example, so watch closely.
You are not writin' all fuzzy like usual?
I want to do writin' like that.
Ah, I am still perfecting that.
Once it is done and acknowledged, then I will instruct you in it.
Until I win grand prize at the Naruka Institute Calligraphy Exhibition next month.
Even if it do not win a prize, it looks plenty good to me.
Instead of fussin' over that stuff, I would rather have fun writin'.
Here, you will write this, Naru.
Now that I am your teacher, you will definitely win prizes.
Once you do, you are sure to understand why
I care so much about winning them.
You will write for one full hour, starting now!
That stroke should not trail off.
You are the ones who asked for my help.
I will not let you get less than grand prize.
But how many times are ya going to make us write the same thing over and over?
Is not there a trick to writing well?
Do you really think it is simple for professionals to write beautifully?!
You need to understand the passion that goes into a single sheet of calligraphy.
have committed trillions, quadrillions, of thoughts to paper!
Despite physical fatigue and mental breakdown...
With each step, you get closer to perfection.
Yet an endless desert still stretches before you.
However, even that god is just another mirage in the desert!
Never seen anyone hallucinate over calligraphy before.
we do not want to go that far just for a middle school assignment!
I knew you guys had no motivation
We do, so let us rest already!
Be sure you keep practicing until I return!
Are not no way he can get a girlfriend like that.
He could have a long-distance relationship.
Maybe I will snoop around the room for evidence...
Maybe he is datin' one of'them.
She is pretty, but she is standing kind of far from him.
Are not she too plain to be Sensei's girlfriend?
As long as she can talk about calligraphy, that is enough.
Ya really think there is a woman who would listen to his delusions?
If it is just listening, even a monkey could do it.
Sensei said this is his treasure.
I bet there is a picture of his sweetheart in it!
I just cannot believe Sensei's a married woman!
Naru, that is not how you use that phrase.
Naru sure does love Sensei a lot.
At his age, it would be weirder if he would never dated a woman.
In another ten years, you will be the beauty, Naru.
Now, let us take a look!
Hey, what are you girls doing?!
If you do not straighten up, you will not win anything, much less grand prize!
You are already 23 years old, Sensei!
Look at other things besides calligraphy!
What are you thinkin', gettin' turned on by historical figures?!
Sensei, you should go out with Naru.
Yer going to die alone at this rate!
And what are you talking about?!
The kids are going on a trip to the beach, and I would like you to chaperone.
I asked their teacher first, but...
If I just have to watch them, that is fine.
It seems Miwa and Tama are going, too.
Please make sure they do not do anything dangerous.
I am having our Hiroshi go along, too, just in case...
This sounds like a real pain.
They are the best for swimmin'.
Is not it hard to swim in regular clothes?
You strip down if ya like, Sensei.
Uh, no, I do not have a swimsuit.
Come on, kids, stick with Hiro-nii!
This guy's just coming for fun, is not he?
Today I am going to master the backstroke!
Do not race around too much!
We come to this beach every year.
It is too rocky to be a beach.
Play somewhere safer, like a sandy beach.
Sandy beaches are for little kids.
Man, this is what is wrong with city slickers.
Yeah, but the goggles keep fogging up and I cannot see them.
When that happens, wipe it with mugwort.
I keep mugwort leaves in here.
Sheesh, that is the problem with kids.
They just do not know how to enjoy the beach.
Sheesh, boys just do not know how to play at the beach.
I am going to rest a bit over by Sensei.
I am more the indoors type.
If you are the indoors type, then settle down.
I feel like she is really staring at me.
Have you ever been so worried about something, you could not sleep at night?
What do you think about Hiro-nii?
I am not sure what I think of him.
He is close in age, and easy to talk to, so... like a brother, I guess?
No... we are not that close.
He is just the guy who brings me my food.
Why would this glasses girl be asking me such a thing?
She must have a crush on Hiro!
That is why she is been acting so odd lately.
Though I am not perfect, she still sees me as a mentor, and wants my advice.
She does have her cute side.
I will support them as much as I can.
He is thoughtful, a good cook...
You do not often see such a great young man.
He is the perfect guy to go out w
Whose fault do you think it is that I am having these sleepless nights?
I am not one of those nasty fujoshi!
You are pretty daring to grab that.
If you can hold it, yer an adult.
It is gross, but it is fine once ya get used to it.
Looks like he is still unconscious.
Let us go someplace real fun.
Yep, one that only adults can go to.
We have not had lunch yet.
She was with Miwa-chan just a second ago.
That is my protege for ya!
When I jumped, I heard Sensei cheerin' me on.
That is why I was not scared at all!
Now that you mention it, he was sayin' something.
You did nothing but dangerous stuff!
We will not do it no more, so do not be mad.
I have never felt like this before.
Before I came to this island, all I ever really had to worry about was myself.
This is the first time I have been so worried about someone else!
Sensei, I will not make you worry again!
I will not do nothing dangerous no more!
The outsider's totally one of the gang now.
Do not expect me to join in.
He is not answering his cell.
I am out of range again.
I kind of like it here.
It is like everything is miniature.
Kyousuke, are you making fun of it?
It is'cuz it is been so humid lately.
You always did have unruly hair.
Oh, did you girls come to fish, too?
It gets like this when I am in good condition.
No, are not it'cuz of the humidity?
You both have similar hair qualities.
No, that will not look good on me.
Oh, there is a bunch here today!
Mind if yer teacher joins ya?
Boy, it is tough when it is this muggy.
So glad I have straight hair...
